LanguageData.ZP_JunmaiSake.label: Junmai
LanguageData.ZP_JunmaiSake.description: Junmai, meaning "Pure rice," is sake made through using only White rice. This sets it apart from others sakes, such as Ginjo, that use non-rice elements. Junmai is also traditionally served warm or at room temperature, while Ginjo is preferably served cold.\nJunmai features a rich, full bodied flavor, and a mildly acidic undertone. ("Body" refers to the complexity and duration of a wine's flavor, with a longer duration being better.)
LanguageData.ZP_JunmaiSake.tools.0.label: bottle
